name: Fantasy patrol: Adventures
description:
An entertaining arcade-style game with characters from your favorite cartoon! Battle rampaging fantastic beasts, outsmart magical traps, and collect valuable items.

Select which of the sorceresses to play as or use them all: defeating strong enemies is easier together! Use magic and all your cleverness! Collect valuable items and rewards.

Help the girls defeat The Big Sadness, that scoundrel Jimmy the genie, and other characters from the show

And don’t forget that skating is the best way to get around Fableton. Check out all your favorite places in Fableton with Helena, Valery, Mary, and Snowy!

The Fantasy Patrol needs your help to handle the raging elements of Fableton!

Spend your time well!

PLEASE NOTE! The app is not supported on iPhone 4s, iPadmini, or on early generations of these devices.

The current edition of the User Agreement is available online at the following address: http://i-moolt.com/agreement/en
